jchess.gui.model.gamewindow

Class GameModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • jchess.gui.model.gamewindow.GameModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IModel, IBoardModel, IClockModel, IGameModel, IPlayerModel

    public class GameModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGameModel, IBoardModel, IClockModel, IPlayerModel
    This class hold all the data that is required to draw Game in whole.

    7 Dec 2019
    Author:
    Sajad Karim
